name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Intermediate Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development, demonstrating proficiency in **Go(lang)**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **gRPC** for building robust and scalable systems. Extensive background in data management using **MySQL** and **Redis**, with a strong focus on software design principles and testable code writing. Proven ability to lead teams and collaborate effectively in fast-paced environments, fostering continuous improvement and delivering high-quality software solutions. Previous contributions include developing agile financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines, optimizing services with **CloudWatch**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana**, and ensuring seamless performance in cloud-native architectures using **AWS** and **Azure**. Acquired valuable insights at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
